last_episode_to_air.name: Robert's Story
last_episode_to_air.overview: Final episode of a two-part contemporary teenage love story. Sixteen-year-old Robert Wisley 'doesn't do girlfriends'; it wouldn't suit his bad-boy image. But all that changes when he meets Lindsey Macallum, the Olympic diving hopeful who becomes pregnant with his baby. Despite facing strong opposition from both family and friends, he surprises himself and Lindsey by embracing the idea of a baby. But he realises it's tougher than either of them imagined to keep hold of your dreams and ideals.

name: Dive
overview: Dive is a two-part British television drama starring Aisling Loftus, Jack O'Connell and Gina McKee. Broadcast on BBC Two in July 2010, the show dealt with the problems of teenage relationships and pregnancy against the backdrop of a young diver's preparations for the 2012 Summer Olympics.

episodes.name: Lindsey's Story
episodes.overview: A contemporary teenage love story told in two parts. Lindsey Macallum isn't like those teenagers you read about in the papers. She doesn't go out to all-night parties, she doesn't drink, and she hasn't even got close to having a boyfriend. Lindsey is a 16-year-old 2012 Olympic diving hopeful and her life is dedicated to her sport. That is until she meets the local bad boy Robert Wisley and they fall in love.

episodes.name: Robert's Story
episodes.overview: Final episode of a two-part contemporary teenage love story. Sixteen-year-old Robert Wisley 'doesn't do girlfriends'; it wouldn't suit his bad-boy image. But all that changes when he meets Lindsey Macallum, the Olympic diving hopeful who becomes pregnant with his baby. Despite facing strong opposition from both family and friends, he surprises himself and Lindsey by embracing the idea of a baby. But he realises it's tougher than either of them imagined to keep hold of your dreams and ideals.
